resources.string: The Avengers began as a group of extraordinary individuals who were assembled to defeat Loki and his Chitauri army in New York City. Since then, the team has expanded its roster and faced a host of new threats, while dealing with their own turmoil.
Drama • Comedy • Thriller • Violent • Dark • Crime
Get your snacks and tap here to watch it! 😄
